item.ptxt: ECM uses ABS or ESP® control module and CAN communication to transmit and receive data for cruise control. Therefore, check that no DTC is detected in ECM and ABS or ESP® control module before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis. If DTC is detected, correct trouble indicated by that DTC first.
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

action.ptxt: Check CANCEL switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection .
Check brake (stop) lamp switch for function referring to Stop (Brake) Lamp Switch Inspection .
Check CPP switch for function referring to Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch (for Cruise Control) Inspection and Adjustment .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
